name: geocase-thumbnail
description: The GeoCASe-UI 2.0 requires an image-server to hold thumbnails of images locates under various domains. In order to speed up the loading of these images this instance of [Imaginary](https://github.com/h2non/imaginary) is being created.
author: Jasper Funk-Smit

scripts.all: node testdata && docker-compose up -d && serve testdata
